front.title: IEEE Standard Test Procedures for Germanium Gamma-Ray Detectors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Terminology and standard test procedures are established for germanium gamma-ray detectors that are used for the detection and high-resolution spectrometry of gamma rays, X rays, and charged particles that produce hole-electron pairs in the crystal lattice so that these items have the same meaning to both manufacturers and users.
